SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class PlayerBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.PlayerBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayerBoard extends Object implements Serializable
PlayerBoard class represents the board of a player. It contains the player's cards, their positions and the count of each symbol.
See Also:

    Method
    Description
    void
    coverCorner(Card card, int[] coordinates)
    When the player board is modified, starting from the last card placed, adds its symbols to the symbol count, covers the corners of the potential card below it and decrements the counter of these symbols.

    • setCardPosition

      public void setCardPosition(Card placedCard, int[] coordinates)
      Sets the position of a card on the player's board.
      Parameters:
      placedCard - the card that has been placed.
      coordinates - the position where the card has been placed.

    • getCardCoordinates

      public int[] getCardCoordinates(Card card)
      Gets the coordinates of a specific card on the player's board.
      Parameters:
      card - the card whose position is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the coordinates of the card.

    • getCard

      public Card getCard(int[] coord)
      Gets the card at a specific position on the player's board.
      Parameters:
      coord - the coordinates of the position.
      Returns:
      the card at the given position, or null if no card is present.

    • getPositionCardKeys

      public Set<Integer> getPositionCardKeys()
      Gets the keys of the card positions on the player's board.
      Returns:
      a set of keys representing the card positions.

    • getSymbolCount

      public Integer getSymbolCount(Symbols s)
      Gets the count of a specific symbol for the player.
      Parameters:
      s - the symbol whose count is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the count of the symbol.

    • setStarterCard

      public void setStarterCard(Card starterCard)
      Sets the starter card of the player and places it on the board at position (0,0).
      Parameters:
      starterCard - the starter card to be set.

    • getStarterCard

      public Card getStarterCard()
      Gets the starter card of the player.
      Returns:
      the starter card of the player.

    • giveStarterCard

      public void giveStarterCard(Card card)
      Gives the player his starter card without placing it on the board.
      Parameters:
      card - the starter card to be given to the player.

    • increaseSymbolCount

      public void increaseSymbolCount(Symbols symbol)
      Increases the count of a specific symbol for the player.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the symbol whose count is to be increased.

    • decreaseSymbolCount

      public void decreaseSymbolCount(Symbols symbol)
      Decreases the count of a specific symbol for the player.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the symbol whose count is to be decreased.

    • coverCorner

      public void coverCorner(Card card, int[] coordinates)
      When the player board is modified, starting from the last card placed, adds its symbols to the symbol count, covers the corners of the potential card below it and decrements the counter of these symbols.
      Parameters:
      card - the last card that was placed.
      coordinates - the coordinates of the last card placed.

    • getCardPosition

      public HashMap<Integer,Card> getCardPosition()
      Gets the positions of all cards on the player's board.
      Returns:
      a map of card positions.
